description: Proposals to make candidate names known before a general election on the Isle of Man are thrown out.
title: Bid to make Manx chief minister hopefuls declare intent rejected
title_page: Bid to make Manx chief minister hopefuls declare intent rejected - BBC News
maintext: However, Paul Quine said the move could give voters the perception that the candidate had a sense of "presumption and entitlement", while Chris Robertshaw argued it could put candidates in a "particularly difficult position" if the views they had articulated to voters turned out to be "at odds with the majority" of MHKs.
